articles.title: Hold the donuts: Dunkin' Donuts to temporarily close all Singapore outlets due to 'operational issues' - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: American donut and coffee chain Dunkin’ Donuts is temporarily closing all its outlets in Singapore from Wednesday (Feb 23) due to “operational issues”.

“The health of our customers and team are our top priority,” said Dunkin’ Donuts in a Faceboo…
articles.content:
SINGAPORE: American donut and coffee chain Dunkin Donuts is temporarily closing all its outlets in Singapore from Wednesday (Feb 23) due to operational issues.

articles.title: Oral Health Report: Mouth Serves as Gateway to Overall Health - CU Anschutz Today
articles.description: University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus contributed 11 experts to the new report, Oral Health in America: Advances and Challenges.
articles.content:
The Oral Health in America report provides a road map on how to improve the nations oral health. Why is it important to create this road map?

articles.title: Mandopop star JJ Lin sues Weibo user for several allegations made last year - CNA
articles.description: The netizen, Xie Minghao, accused JJ Lin and Taiwanese-American singer Wilber Pan of rape, taking drugs and evading taxes back in Aug 2021.
articles.content:
Back in Aug 2021, Xie had posted that JJ Lin and (Taiwanese-American singer) Wilber Pan have taken drugs, lured others to take drugs, evaded taxes, and raped women".
